body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Bell Solutions. My name is Peter Bell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, Sara. I hope you're doing well today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: To assist you better, could you please provide me with your date of birth in the format zero four slash zero one slash one nine eight seven?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is zero four slash zero one slash one nine eight seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara. Additionally, could you also provide me with your street address, including your house number and street name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my street address is one two three Main Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Sara. I will ensure your privacy is respected.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today. Have a great day, Sara.
